scripts.deploy:s3:static: aws s3 cp ./build s3://demo.mcp.conapps.click --storage-class REDUCED_REDUNDANCY --recursive --exclude index.html --acl public-read --metadata-directive REPLACE --expires 2034-01-01T00:00:00Z --cache-control max-age=2592000,public --region sa-east-1 --profile serverless
scripts.deploy:s3:index: aws s3 cp ./build/index.html s3://demo.mcp.conapps.click --storage-class REDUCED_REDUNDANCY --acl public-read --metadata-directive REPLACE --expires 0 --cache-control no-cache,no-store,must-revalidate --region sa-east-1 --profile serverless
